article.title: Rockwell Collins Supports Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance Network
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Government Systems, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, was awarded a $13 million contract to provide for the logistic and fielding support for the Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance Network.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama is the contracting activity.
